Guitar Challenges by the Fiasco Bros. EST 1991.

Well, hello there

Welcome to Guitar Challenges by the Fiasco Bros., where two long-standing guitarist buddies come up with guitar challenges for each other to keep themselves entertained, engaged and alive.

First challenge

  • March 2025: “Circles” by Joe Satriani

Can our heroes remember (or learn) how to play “Circles” by Joe Satriani all the way through? When one of them has a gammy finger and the other has a broken A/B box? Let’s find out.
